summary: An Ordinance providing for the establishing of a main trunk sewer or drainage district, to be known as the "Twenty-seventh Avenue South Main Trunk Sewer District," and for the construction within said district a main trunk sewer, with certain short branches to intercept certain laterals heretofore constructed. The boundaries of the district constituting sand Twenty-seventh Avenue South Main Trunk Sewer District shall include all of that territory described as follows, to-wit.
